batanalawawadanaya kirima tharamak apahasu karunak wuwada sangitha rasakamin wisheshayen alumkarana mema sangitha upakaranaya wasdanda lesada hadunwayi.oba methek daka nomathi wishala batanalawak nirmanaya kirimata nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye walapane harasbadda maha widyalaye sangitha aacharyawaraya samathwi thibembaahuge nama di.je amaradasa ya.ohu nirmanaya kala mema batanalawe diga adi 9 yi.agal 7.5 ki.ehi siduru 31 ki.nawa sangitha bhanda nirmanaya kirimata almak dakwana amaradasa mahatha sangitha bhanda nirmanaya wenuwen janadhipathi sammana labhiyeki 2012 dayata kirula pradarshanayasadaha ohu wisin nirmanaya kala sangitha bhandapradarshanaya kirimen sammana laba atha.1990 warshaye prathamika guruwarayaku lesa guru wruththiyata praweshawu amaradasa mahatha ambaan alla widyalaye mulinma sewaye niraka wiya.2000 warshaye di giragama saundarya guru widyalaye sangitha guruwarayeku lesa puhunu laba suwahasak darudariyange sangitha gnyanaya pubuduwalime nirathawa sitiyi..
